entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core adding a migration exception using DDD and value objects #30639
  • DbUpdateConcurrencyException raised when inserting into Postgres partitioned table #30638
  • Why does EF Core try to create objects that are not present in the class? #30636
  • Duplicate subquery when doing base type/derived type projection #30635
  • Moving entity between collections inconsistently deletes children #30634

Closed

  • Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30330
    7.0.6
  • Linq select cannot project an entity containing both Json columns and ICollections #30266
    7.0.6
  • Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30565
    7.0.6
  • EFCore6.x 用代码实现自动迁移 #30619
  • RowLimitingOperationWithoutOrderByWarning false positive #30550
  • Simple migration apparently completed, but prompt in Package Manager Control not restored #30548
  • Add-Migration is not recognized in Package Manager unless two instances of the Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design package are installed. #30547
  • Error when connect database transient failure in Visual Studio 2022 #30546
  • Generated SQL add extra precision to decimal constant without precision #30545
  • Owned type and inheritance issue #30541
  • InvalidOperationException with GroupBy() #30495
  • Use generic attribute for EntityTypeConfiguration attribute #30606
  • NullRef scaffolding Postgres DB #30621

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid updating unchanged properties #30640
    Servicing-consider
  • Update SqliteMigrationsSqlGenerator.cs #30637

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30330 - Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30615
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix for #30266 and #30565 - projecting json entity/reference as well as regular entity collection #30600
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6

Updated

  • Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #30617
  • Scaffolding: Fix handling of ConnectionString annotation #30631
